import React, { Component } from "react"; class SupplierTenderList extends Component { state = {}; async componentDidMount() { try { const { data } = await httpService.get( `${config.apiendpoint}/supplier/myTenderList` ); if (data.user.profileType.toLowerCase() === "supplier") { const supplier = data.user; toast.success(data.message); this.setState({ supplier: supplier }); } else this.props.history.push(`/${data.user.profileType}`); } catch (error) { toast.error(error.message); return; } } render() { return (
